title: Baked Halibut Steaks
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '125g (4 oz) diced courgette', '75g (3 oz) minced onion', '1 clove garlic, peeled and minced', '350g (13 oz) diced fresh tomatoes', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 (170g) halibut steaks', '60g (2 oz) crumbled feta cheese']
